q: Can you turn on quick suggestions when I'm typing comments or strings?
I'd like to see possible code completions as I type in the editor, including when I'm writing comments or strings.
I want to use the 'Enter' key to accept suggestions only when the suggestion includes text changes.
I want to be able to confirm the suggested changes with the 'Enter' key, but only when the suggestion actually modifies the text.
Can you set the delay for quick suggestions to 1000 ms?
I need a bit more time before the quick suggestions pop up, can we make it a second?
I want the suggestions to automatically appear when I type certain trigger characters.
I'd like to have some hints pop up when I'm typing certain characters, can you make that happen?
Can you turn off the locality bonus for suggestions?
I don't want the suggestions to be sorted based on their proximity to the cursor.
Can you always select the first suggestion when showing the suggest list?
I want the first suggestion to be automatically selected when the list of suggestions appears.
Can you set the word-based suggestions to be computed from all open documents?
I want the suggestions to be based on words from all the open documents, not just the active one.
I want to enable the parameter hints while I'm coding.
I need some help with the parameters while I'm typing my code. Can you show me some hints?
